description: Transportation, Storage and Warehousing Services for CFIA’s IT Equipment in Moncton, NB
full_summary:
================================
**Title:** IT Equipment Storage in Moncton, NB {Entreposage d'équipement de TI à Moncton, NB}
================================

**Tender Reference:** cb-6829-96482248

**Solicitation Number:** 2024-00079

**Publication Date:** 2023-06-29

**Tender Closing Date (Eastern Time):** 2023-07-28T14:00:00

**Designated Contracting Officer:**
Catherine Clairoux
Email: [catherine.clairoux@inspection.gc.ca](mailto:catherine.clairoux@inspection.gc.ca)
Phone: (343) 596-9265

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposals (RFP)

**Procurement Category:** SRV (Services)

**Procurement Method:** Competitive Open Bidding

**Solicitation Documents:**

 * Request for Proposal (RFP): [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6829/2024-00079-request-for-proposal-%28rfp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6829/2024-00079-request-for-proposal-%28rfp.pdf)
 * Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP): [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6829/2024-00079-notice-of-proposed-procurement-%28npp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6829/2024-00079-notice-of-proposed-procurement-%28npp.pdf)

**Project Description:**

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) requires the provision of Transportation, Storage, and Warehousing Services for its Information Technology (IT) equipment in Moncton, New Brunswick. The successful bidder will be responsible for securely storing, transporting, and managing the CFIA's IT equipment.

**Notice of Amendment:**

This services solicitation has been amended. Please refer to the original solicitation documents and any subsequent amendments for updated information.

**Evaluation Criteria:**

The proposed services shall be evaluated based on the following criteria:
 * Lowest Price

**Bidder Instructions:**

Please submit your proposal electronically, using the contact information provided above. Failure to follow the solicitation requirements may result in rejection of the bid.

**Closing Information:**
